original_text: And the vessels also of gold and silver of the house of God, which Nebuchadnezzar took out of the temple that was in Jerusalem, and brought them into the temple of Babylon, those did Cyrus the king take out of the temple of Babylon, and they were delivered unto one, whose name was Sheshbazzar, whom he had made governor;
korean_text: 또 느부갓네살이 예루살렘 하나님의 성전 안에서 금, 은 그릇을 옮겨다가 바벨론 신당에 두었던 것을 고레스 왕이 그 신당에서 꺼내어 그가 세운 총독 세스바살이라고 부르는 자에게 내주고

sentences.original_text: And the vessels also of gold and silver of the house of God
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 하나님의 집의 금과 은 그릇들도

sentences.original_text: which Nebuchadnezzar took out of the temple
and brought them into the temple of Babylon
those did Cyrus the king take out of the temple of Babylon
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들을 고레스 왕이 바벨론 성전에서 가져내어

sentences.original_text: and they were delivered unto one
